title: Brilliant
comment: Despite of some stability issues, already useful and I'm sure this will pay itself off in no time. Hopefully I'll find time to help with the project as well. For now, even with stability issues, paying £1.99 is well worth it.

title: Does not work on nexus7
comment: Dies after search, I really hope this gets patched soon and I'm sure once it is fixed it will be a great app.

title: Nicely done.
comment: Great reference. Looks great on my TF101 tablet.

title: Excellent CPAN docs browser
comment: Easy to read CPAN docs browser, nicely laid out, eg code blocks which are wider than the screen can be dragged to scroll.  Only 4 stars so far because it is missing a few features which hopefully will follow in the near future, but still definitely worth having already
